items.sentence: Tom begged his parents to let him go to Boston.
Tom began drinking heavily after his wife died.
Tom asked me how many times I'd been to Boston.
Tom asked me how many pieces of cake I'd eaten.
Tom asked Mary not to tell John where he lived.
Tom and Mary met at a party on Valentine's Day.
Not every student studying law can be a lawyer.
I met somebody yesterday who knows your father.
How much does it usually cost to go to a movie?
How old were you the first time you drank beer?
